dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, you are not going to believe this!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, you are not going to believe this!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh, what now? Another, like, tax hike or something?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh, what now? Another, like, tax hike or something?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No no no, listen. Akmola Region, okay? Prosecutors. They've returned, like, ten thousand hectares of unused land back to the state!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No no no, listen. Akmola Region, okay? Prosecutors. They've returned, like, ten thousand hectares of unused land back to the state!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This year, following a supervisory act, six land plots with a total area of 10,000 hectares were returned to state ownership.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ten thousand, huh? Sounds like, uh, a lot, I guess? So what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ten thousand, huh? Sounds like, uh, a lot, I guess? So what?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So what?! I mean, it's huge, right? For years these plots were just sitting there, doing nothing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So what?! I mean, it's huge, right? For years these plots were just sitting there, doing nothing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These plots had not been used for more than three years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but it's like, just land. Are we talking, um, prime real estate? Or just like, some dusty fields?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but it's like, just land. Are we talking, um, prime real estate? Or just like, some dusty fields?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, wait, the article says it’s worth like 82.7 million tenge! That's, you know, not chump change.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, wait, the article says it's worth like eighty two point seven million tenge! That's, you know, not chump change.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Their total cadastral value amounted to 82.7 million tenge,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but for how many years? Three? And it's only six plots? I mean, come on, that's, uh, barely a dent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but for how many years? Three? And it's only six plots? I mean, come on, that's, uh, barely a dent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: six land plots with a total area of 10,000 hectares were returned to state ownership. These plots had not been used for more than three years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Still! It’s about accountability, right? Like, the government actually doing something to make sure resources aren’t just wasted.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still! It's about accountability, right? Like, the government actually doing something to make sure resources aren't just wasted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Or, uh, making a show of it, you know? Like, cleaning up their own mess eventually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or, uh, making a show of it, you know? Like, cleaning up their own mess eventually.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But the prosecutors in Yereymentau, they're like, continuously working on this. It's an ongoing effort.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the prosecutors in Yereymentau, they're like, continuously working on this. It's an ongoing effort.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The prosecutor's office of the Yereymentau District is continuously working to reclaim land plots that are not being used as intended. ... Work in this area is ongoing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, "ongoing." That just means it’s, uh, never really finished. Probably just moving the paperwork around.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, ongoing. That just means it's, uh, never really finished. Probably just moving the paperwork around.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I don't know, I think it's, like, a win. People need land, right? For agriculture, whatever.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I don't know, I think it's, like, a win. People need land, right? For agriculture, whatever.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Or, uh, it'll just sit unused again. Just, like, under a different name.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or, uh, it'll just sit unused again. Just, like, under a different name.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No! This is important! It's like a signal, you know? That things are changing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No! This is important! It's like a signal, you know? That things are changing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh huh. Yeah. Sure, B. Sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh huh. Yeah. Sure, B. Sure.
